name: Invisible Werewolf Dracula meets Vampire Mummy Frankenstein
name_original: Invisible Werewolf Dracula meets Vampire Mummy Frankenstein
description:
THEY'RE BACK in an illustrated, action-packed adventure!

Globetrotting outlaw Dracula finds a powerful ally in an Egyptian crypt—Frankenstein’s monster himself. Can these fiends thwart the werewolf regime and take back the night?

If you like the name, you'll love the book (and the audiobook)! Invisible Werewolf Dracula meets Vampire Mummy Frankenstein is a bizarre pastiche of classic horror films and literature, made with love, corny jokes, and a thick thesaurus.
